name: Irminsul
desc: Irminsul can be thought of as a large tree growing downwards rather than upwards, containing all the knowledge and wisdom of the world from ancient times to the present. Ley Lines, like the roots of Irminsul, cross the earth, absorbing the memories of the world.

customize.name: Rukkhadevata
customize.desc: The Goddess of Wisdom, the previous Dendro Archon, and a friend of Nabu Malikata and King Deshret. She was completely erased from Irminsul to save it from forbidden knowledge.

customize.name: Buer
customize.desc: The Dendro Archon of Sumeru.

customize.text: Greater Lord Rukkhadevata and Lesser Lord Kusanali are the avatars of Irminsul, whose consciousness is linked to it. Rukkhadevata saved Irminsul from forbidden knowledge several thousand years ago, but later it was infected again during the

customize.name: Khaenri'ahn cataclysm
customize.desc: A disaster that occurred 500 years ago. The Abyss was released into Teyvat and Khaenri'ah was destroyed.

customize.text: . The forbidden knowledge spread to Rukkhadevata's own consciousness, so 500 years later Nahida erased the Greater Lord from Irminsul to stop the corruption. Since then, no one who belongs to Teyvat remembers the Greater Lord.

customize.name: Hexenzirkel
customize.desc: A secret witch society, which discusses secrets at the tea parties and explores Irminsul. There are eight witches in the Hexenzirkel.

customize.text: Witches from the Hexenzirkel study Irminsul. On some of them (for example,

customize.name: Alice
customize.desc: The Sustainer of the World's Borders, Great Adventurer of the Realms, Dodo-King, Defender of Old Mondstadt, Friend of Adults Who Yet Harbor Hope, Author of the Teyvat Travel Guide, Originator of the Kujirai Art - Temari Jutsu, Supplier to the Renowned Lord Sangemah Bay, Elder and founder of the Hexenzirkel, Codename "A," Mother of Klee.

customize.name: Scaramouche
customize.desc: The former sixth of the Eleven Fatui Harbingers, created by Raiden Ei.

customize.text: Scaramouche erased himself from Irminsul to try to change the past, but it only rewrote people's memories of the past, as Irminsul can't change reality.

customize.name: Descenders
customize.desc: Beings from outside of Teyvat, whose wills can rival an entire world.

customize.name: Aloy
customize.desc: Formerly an outcast, now a hunter of unparalleled skill. Ready to do the right thing at any time.

customize.text:
Irminsul does not influence beings from other worlds.
Traveler's Sibling
The information about the sibling was intentionally changed in Irminsul.

customize.name: Sumeru Akademiya
customize.desc: The Sumeru organization, which exercises administrative control over the region and educates people.

customize.text: It is a common practice among the scholars of Sumeru to contact Irminsul. When Irminsul was contaminated with forbidden knowledge, many scholars went mad during the Satyavada Life stage. They believed that since Irminsul contained divine knowledge, touching such knowledge without the proper preparations and abilities would only lead to one's mind caving in on itself.

customize.name: Fatui
customize.desc: A Snezhnayan organization that is loyal to the Tsaritsa and has spread out all over the continent. Its Harbingers are on the hunt for the Gnoses.

customize.text: The Fatui know Irminsul's structure. From the information they received, they learned that the sky of Teyvat was fake.

customize.name: Silver Twig
customize.desc:
A new branch taken from the center of the world.

There was once a giant tree that ran across the world, and this twig was part of it. Though it has been removed from the tree, their connection remains strong as ever.

Therefore, as long as the giant white tree that symbolizes the center of the world does not die, it will never wither.

"Trees" symbolize life. In one of the stories from a certain place, there was a person who had entrusted her consciousness to the white tree's branches before she passed away. In that way, neither her life nor hope would be lost, since the branches would grow and sprout where there was sunshine and rain, and would one day blossom and bear fruits.

"Trees" also symbolize wisdom. In one of the legends, a sage hanging upside down on a tree had acquired the knowledge of how to inscribe runes and control sacred words, and thus followed the kingdom established along the tree's roots, eventually gaining a glimpse of the secret of the cosmos.

All knowledge, memory, and experience flow through this giant tree, just like a stream flows into a river, the river joins a sea, the sea turns into clouds, and the clouds rain onto the ground - just like life itself.

customize.name: Dead Ley Line Branch
customize.desc: Fragile branches from deep within the earth. Even after years of aging, from beneath it's mottled surface you can see that its power is not yet entirely lost.

customize.name: Dead Ley Line Leaves
customize.desc: A twig from deep within the earth. Though it is far from where it once lay, its leaves still pulsate with energy.

customize.name: Ley Line Sprout
customize.desc: It is said that there was a great tree whose roots once spread out to every corner of the world, and this branch is said to be part of it. It is almost if it was never broken off and taken far away, for its vitality is such that it still sprouts new leaves even now.

customize.name: Original Resin
customize.desc: It is said that the roots of all the Irminsul trees and blossoms in the world are intertwined at the deepest, most hidden place in the earth, and that the pattern the root system makes defines the Ley Lines of the world.

customize.name: Fragile Resin
customize.desc:
An item used to restore Original Resin by 60 points.

This crystalline substance pulsates with a little energy that can be absorbed by Original Resin. The flow of energies of all sorts is the source of many wonders and challenges in the world. Those same energies are also contained within this crystal.

customize.name: Condensed Resin
customize.desc:
You can hold no more than 5 at a time.
Condensed tree resin that can be used instead of Original Resin to revitalize Petrified Trees and Ley Line Blossoms to receive greater rewards.
Crystal filled with immense energy.
The silver-white Irminsul trees and blossoms are connected to ley lines that have become blocked over time. The energy contained in tree resin can purify the obstructing substance.

customize.name: Transient Resin
customize.desc:
An item that can be used to replenish Original Resin. Once used, it will replenish 60 Original Resin.

Once obtained, it will automatically dissipate after a period of time.

· The expiration time will be calculated from the Monday after this item is obtained, and it will disappear seven days from then.

· Multiple Transient Resins obtained on different weeks will have their expiration dates counted independently.

Pure energy that will dissipate with time. In this, it is similar to all else that is lovely in this world. But seize this opportunity and go make the world a slightly better place, as is fitting for one who dwells within the bounds of "time."

customize.name: Prototype Crescent
customize.desc: A prototype longbow discovered in the Blackcliff Forge. The arrow fired from this bow glimmers like a ray of moonlight.

imgDesc.text: Frostbearing tree, a part of Irminsul.
Angels are protecting Irminsul from a dragon in Natlan.
